data.actual_result: You get muted after speaking and keybind breaks until you rejoin
data.expected_result: You don't get muted after speaking and keybind keeps working
data.short_description: Push to talk keybind doesn't work properly
data.steps_to_repro: - go to voice and video in settings - set Space as the push to talk keybind - mute yourself in the bottom left - join a voice channel - unmute yourself - press space - observe how you get muted after speaking, and the keybind stops working until you leave and rejoin
